dialogue.htmlContent:
Turning towards Lilaya, you get her attention before asking, [pc.speech(Is it ok if I extract some more levels?)]

[lilaya.speech(Of course!)] she responds. [lilaya.speech(Use as many vials as you'd like!)]

Reaching down to pull a few of the little glass containers out from their storage, you wonder which, and how many, of your levels to extract...

You pull out the little cork from the top of one of the glass vials, and, closing your [pc.eyes], you concentrate on extracting the level. Suddenly, you feel a strange little tugging sensation, and, opening your [pc.eyes], you see a pink, swirling glow within the vial in your [pc.hand]. Pushing the cork stopper back in the top, you smile as you realise that you've successfully extracted a level; something that only a Lilin should be able to do!
